segments.text: Mr.Wang , we haven't discussed the mode of payment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know Mr . Forster , this is a really large purchase . I am afraid we can't pay off at one time . We have to pay by installment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mean you prefer a deferred payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do you start the payment then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll start our payment in half a year and the total amount will be paid off within 2 years by three installments .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can accept that but you have to pay the interest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall we sign the agreement now ?
segments.speaker: S1
